name: workspace
description: What's new: - ✅ Installable PWA (manifest) with offline cache + instant updates - ✅ Network-first for HTML (fresh when online), cache fallback, offline page - ✅ Cache-first for static assets with background refresh - ✅ Update toast prompts users to refresh when a new version is ready - ✅ /tester    Browser UI to call /api/generate_posts and preview results - ✅ Tip: Use X for short copy (<=280 chars) and LinkedIn for long form.
